1.00.0.name: wordpress/wp-get-personal-lite
1.00.0.description:
WP Get Personal Lite allows you to personalize pages by adding a name to the end of the URL. It works well when used with an email system/autoresponder.

Upgrade to the full version for the following additional features:

  1. Personalize the homepage
  2. Look up personalization data in a CSV file
  3. Display multiple fields with "merge-tags" anywhere inside your post/page
  4. "Remember" users with a cookie and/or user profile
  5. Display Geolocation data: city, country
  6. Display Geolocation specific content. e.g. special content for visitors from UK or from Madrid

Please visit http://WPGetPersonal.com for further information.

In this release: New shortcode attibute: format Example usage: [wpgetpersonal format="Hello again, s%!"]
